fatigue-plus.name: Fatigue+
fatigue-plus.description: Fatigue+ is a lightweight, immersive Minecraft mod that simulates sleep deprivation. Designed for Minecraft 1.8.9 (Forge) and built to work client-side only, this mod tracks how long youâ€™ve stayed awake and progressively makes your experience more difficult.

added: Sleep deprivation mechanic with progressive debuffs and death
Client-side mod for Minecraft 1.8.9 using Forge
